summary: I have been helping companies and organizations of all sizes bring their website aspirations to life since 2010. With my experience in project management, product development, and UX design, I've worked with hundreds of companies of all sizes on their website buildouts.As the Founder & Lead Web Strategist for Lumen Foundry, I'm always looking to work with new clients with exciting challenges and innovative ideas. We are experts in development for WordPress, WooCommerce, Easy Digital Downloads, membership systems, and innovative marketplace websites. Visit lumenfoundry.com to get in touch.
